name: Project CC
description:
Project CC is a waves like game sort of like the Call Of Duty Zombies franchise. Your in a hospital where you must fight waves of weird creatures earning money from each kill. With the money unlock new areas and power ups. Use strategy to decide what is best for you at the moment to keep you alive until the next wave. 

                    *This is my first game I've ever created. I'm a 17 year old that is hoping to one day be a video game designer, and I have finally finished my first ever project. I started the project about a year ago on UE4 and then took a break for a long time. Just recently I finished it, and the entire game was probably built in about 4 months or so. Yes there will be bugs, yes the polish is not great, but I am very excited to release my first game and see what people think. Criticism is good so I can gain information for my next project. 

*The only assets I used from the marketplace where the furniture pack, and effects pack I know a lot of beginners like to use assets but not me
